description: NetAppBackupPolicy is the Schema for the NetAppBackupPolicy API

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: NetAppBackupPolicySpec defines the desired state of NetAppBackupPolicy

dailyBackupLimit.description: Number of daily backups to keep. Note that the minimum daily backup limit is 2.

enabled.description: If enabled, make backups automatically according to the schedules. This will be applied to all volumes that have this policy attached and enforced on volume level. If not specified, default is true.

monthlyBackupLimit.description: Number of monthly backups to keep. Note that the sum of daily, weekly and monthly backups should be greater than 1.

projectRef.description: The Project that this resource belongs to.

external.description: The `projectID` field of a project, when not managed by Config Connector.

kind.description: The kind of the Project resource; optional but must be `Project` if provided.

resourceID.description: The GCP resource identifier. If not given, the metadata.name will be used.

weeklyBackupLimit.description: Number of weekly backups to keep. Note that the sum of daily, weekly and monthly backups should be greater than 1.

status.description: NetAppBackupPolicyStatus defines the config connector machine state of NetAppBackupPolicy

conditions.description: Conditions represent the latest available observations of the object's current state.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

message.description: Human-readable message indicating details about last transition.

reason.description: Unique, one-word, CamelCase reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status is the status of the condition. Can be True, False, Unknown.

type.description: Type is the type of the condition.

externalRef.description: A unique specifier for the NetAppBackupPolicy resource in GCP.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the generation of the resource that was most recently observed by the Config Connector controller. If this is equal to metadata.generation, then that means that the current reported status reflects the most recent desired state of the resource.

observedState.description: ObservedState is the state of the resource as most recently observed in GCP.

assignedVolumeCount.description: Output only. The total number of volumes assigned by this backup policy.

createTime.description: Output only. The time when the backup policy was created.

state.description: Output only. The backup policy state.
